name: ai-cificare
description: Welcome to the glorious world of Google Gemini appication called AI-CIFICare pronounce (see-if-I-care), your one-stop shop for AI-powered shenanigans and side-splitting absurdity! Built with the magic of Node.js and the whimsical whispers of the Gemini API, this project promises to bring a healthy dose of laughter (and maybe a sprinkle of existential dread) to your day.
author: Ahmed Gadir
